channel.title: Kim Hamilton Duffy on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Swashbuckling Safety Training
item.description: Swashbuckling safety training with decentralized identifiers and verifiable credentials Kim Hamilton Duffy, kimdhamilton https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1168573225065951235 Introduction I was very excited to hear that I was speaking right after someone from the Pirate Party. We’re part of the Digital Credentials Effort led by MIT and 12 other major universities. We will have a whitepaper out at the end of September. I am a W3c credentials community group co-chair. Formerly CTO of Learning Machine, and architected and built blockcerts at MIT Media Lab.
